subject: Throttle pedal stopped working
description_text:
Good afternoon, today I received the Simsonn Pro X Ultra Pedals and when I
mounted them to my rig it was working fine but after 30 minutes of playing
the throttle stopped working. The RGB lights are working fine but the pedal
doesn't register anything. I already tried to calibrate a few times,
turning off and turning on my PC and I have the latest Simsonn Manager
version. Let me know what more I can do to try to make them work again.

Best regards,
Hugo
